snippet.title: Rollin' Rascal - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
https://rollinrascal.com/

⬇️⬇️Support the game on Kickstarter⬇️⬇️
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/curiomatic/rollin-rascal

*This is a pre-alpha build of the game. Gameplay footage is not final and is subject to change.*

Rollin’ Rascal will bring the fast-paced action of classic Sonic games and mix it with the rich world interactions of Super Mario Bros. in an experience that appeals to classic speedsters while remaining accessible for newcomers to these exciting gameplay genres.

Wondering how you can help? Rollin’ Rascal is now on Kickstarter! We’ll have a series of rewards for those that choose to support the game’s production, including a handful of early-bird specials. Your generous contributions will directly fund Rollin’ Rascal’s production as we head toward the finish line. We've already released a free public demo of the game, so everyone can get a taste for how the game is shaping up!

A big thank you to Gabriel for sharing his vision with us! Production has been a very fulfilling experience for the team, and we’d like to thank our fans that have supported us for so many years as we’ve grown as a team. We can’t wait to show you more of Rollin’ Rascal!

TWITTER: http://twitter.com/curiomatic
PATREON: http://patreon.com/curiomatic
DISCORD: https://discord.gg/fqFEAsh

Business Email - Team@Curiomatic.com
